configurationItems.name: keys
configurationItems.description: Set the Elasticsearch api keys for each endpoint. Note: Use api key or basic auth, but not both.

configurationItems.name: users
configurationItems.description: Set the Elasticsearch users for each endpoint. Note: Use api key or basic auth, but not both.

configurationItems.name: passwords
configurationItems.description: Set the Elasticsearch passwords for each endpoint. Note: Use api key or basic auth, but not both.

configurationItems.name: dashboard
configurationItems.description: Set the kibana dashboard id that will be linked in the report

configurationItems.name: index
configurationItems.description: Define the Elasticsearch indices to use

configurationItems.name: size
configurationItems.description: Define the number of hits per index to return

configurationItems.name: cert_path
configurationItems.description: Path to the CA on the system used to check server certificate
